tasks.title: Deploying to production server
tasks.description: The website is failry completed, and I believe is time to deploy to the server. There are couple things I need to do:
subTask: Creating a SSL Certification from Let's Encrypt
Setting up NGINX and Proxy to redirect to HTTPS
Initialize new git repository, in order to clone repository on the server

progress.title: Day 4: Refactoring my CSS to SASS
progress.content: Today mainly was working with SASS and optimizing my code, to be more compact. In addition I've been working on the navigation bar, and trying to fix a bug on top overring Bootstrap navbar-default, so that is going to be fun to work on today.

progress.title: Day 3: Fast Development
progress.content: I am fairly proud of this project. This is a fast prototype website that I started building March 2nd, 2019. The project is 3 days old, as I write this article. I decided to use Bootstrap, since I needed to build a quick project, and showcase my projects.

progress.title: Day 2: Everything in JSON!
progress.content: Most of the pages, specificially my tables are being loaded via JSON on Express, and is being parsed to EJS in order to be rendered. I am hoping, to create a more dynamic website, once I have the website structurize.
